document.full_text: the union representing n.b.a. players announced that it had filed a complaint with the national labor relations board accusing league officials of failing to negotiate in good faith.
document.title: turning to labor board, n.b.a. union fires first
lines_and_colors: the union representing n.b.a. players announced that it had filed a complaint with the national labor relations board accusing league officials of failing to negotiate in good faith.
